pkgmetadata.longdescription: Equal Covariance Functions Testing by L2-Norm and Sup-Norm // Testing the equality of several covariance functions of functional data. Four different methods are implemented: L2-norm with W-S naive, L2-norm with W-S bias-reduced, L2-norm (Zhang 2013) ISBN:9781439862735, and sup-norm with resampling (Guo et al. 2017) arXiv:1609.04232.
